en.aboutText: Experienced DevOps engineer with over 3 years of hands-on experience in automating CI/CD processes, deploying applications, and maintaining production environments. I have a comprehensive understanding of the software development lifecycle (SDLC), gained through work on projects using Agile/Scrum methodologies. I have practical experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, Azure DevOps and cloud environment Azure & Openshift, which allows me to efficiently automate deployment processes, improve development team productivity, and ensure system stability. I quickly learn new technologies and tools, enabling me to adapt effectively to evolving project requirements.
en.certE12: E.12. Assembly and operation of personal computers and external devices
en.certE13: E.13. Designing of local computer networks and network administration
en.certE14: E.14. Creation of web applications and databases and database administration
en.experienceAndSkills: Here's an overview of the technologies and tools I work with
en.infrastructureDesc: Here you will find a detailed overview of the infrastructure used to build this site, including tools and technologies applied during its development.
en.securityNoticeText: This repository is public for demonstration and inspiration purposes. It was created as an after-hours side-project to showcase infrastructure, tooling and CI/CD patterns for a personal portfolio. No real credentials, private keys, hostnames, ports or IP addresses are included. All credentials and secrets must be provided via GitHub Actions Secrets or environment variables â€” without them the resources will not be reachable or operational. DO NOT attempt to connect to any resources using information from this repository - it won't work.
